name: Jewel Match 3
synopsis: When Luna returns to Nevernear, she finds her homeland in ruins. The once-glorious kingdom has been razed to the ground by an evil power. Plunge headlong with Luna into a fantastic Match 3 adventure packed with magic, fantasy... and the insidious Evil. Exploit the power of the five Mages and conquer darkness in 100 huge Match 3 levels. Rebuild Nevernear’s castles and create mysterious gardens to keep Evil at bay. Let yourself be swept away into Luna’s wonderful world - and the fantastic story of Nevernear. 100 absolutely huge levels Three game modes: Timed, Relaxed and Match 3 Maniac mode Great mini-games Lots of new extras, plus expanded game mechanics
